Content-Type: text/plain; charset=UTF-8

You can check character availability here:
http://www.wikihost.org//w/nbwrpg_wiki/character_list

The list is a bit out of date, but things move slow here.  On a side note,
if possible, please update your characters on the wiki.  I'll try to spruce
it up a bit as well.
On Jun 29, 2011 3:21 AM, "Super Cyclonus" <supercyclonus@...> wrote:
> Blackarachnia and Waspinator are both available. Thier body forms are
> open to interpretation. I usually assume they are as they were at the
> end of BW's
>
> Starscream is currently 'dead' on the floor of the Ark, however there
> is a version of him that could be brought into play if you like:
> http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Starscream_(BWII)
>
> As to Megatron's Ducky? Well Airly, I will let you answer that one as
> you play Hydras and as he inherited Megatron's spark, I guess he has
> his ducky too :)
>
> http://tfwiki.net/wiki/Rubber_Ducky
>
> - Preston
>
> On 6/28/11, adamsafran <adamsafran@...> wrote:
>> Am curious on the current in-game status of a few characters, wanting to
>> know where they're at IC before trying to write up applications and such
for
>> them and to fit in the current background of the game!
>>
>> Uhm, currently wanting to know current status of Megatron's Ducky,
>> Blackarachnia, Starscream, and Waspinator. What thier current allegiance
is
>> in the game, current bodyforms, and a general summary (if available) of
>> their story arcs from previous players or as NPC's so I could match it up
in
>> writing them up!
>>
>> Thanks.
>>
>> ADAM
>>
>>
>
>
> ------------------------------------
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>

--20cf3071cc3e598eec04a6f3c9ef
